* GuildMasters may kick/ban for any reason they see fit

* Report trolls
* Follow ruqqus TOS

data.description:
#WalkAway Campaign, founded by Brandon Straka

"The #WalkAway Campaign is a grassroots campaign created by Brandon Straka. It is a video campaign movement, dedicated to sharing the stories of people who can no longer accept the current ideology of liberalism and what the Democratic Party has become. Some left long ago. Many of us have recently been “red-pilled”. Some here have wanted to leave for some time, but have feared the consequences they might suffer from friends or family if they walk away." - Brandon Straka 

For our latest updates, follow us on Telegram 
https://t.me/BrandonStraka
https://t.me/NewRightNet 
https://t.me/Patriot911News 
https://t.me/RealMemeworks 
https://t.me/ShirtOfTheDay 
https://t.me/VeteranNation 
https://t.me/PatriotHousewives 
https://t.me/WhatsNext_WTF
https://t.me/BiostockBull

data.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

data.description:
A guild dedicated asking for objective explanations.

This includes:

- Mathematics

- Economics

- Culture

- Biology

- Technology

- Engineering

and more.

---


❌ Don't submit to argue a point of view

❌ Don't bring bigotry here; this isn't the place

✅ Do explain your answers; merely answering is not enough

✅ Do make friendly, simplified and layperson-accessible explanations

---

Have fun!
data.description_html:
A guild dedicated asking for objective explanations.

This includes:

  • Mathematics

  • Economics

  • Culture

  • Biology

  • Technology

  • Engineering

and more.

❌ Don't submit to argue a point of view

❌ Don't bring bigotry here; this isn't the place

✅ Do explain your answers; merely answering is not enough

✅ Do make friendly, simplified and layperson-accessible explanations

Have fun!

data.description: **History's cool kids, looking fantastic!** A pictorial and video celebration of history's coolest kids, everything from beatniks to bikers, mods to rude boys, hippies to ravers. And everything in between. If you've found a photo, or a photo essay, of people from the past looking fantastic, here's the place to share it.

data.description:
Do you reject the infantilization of modern humans and the ensuing degeneracy? Are you a King who leads a clean life and holds traditional morals? This may be the home for you.
1. This is a positive sub; engage with Kings in that way!
2. Be a constructive member, please.
3. Don't advocate for mediocrity, push people forward!
4. No politics. That's a firm rule.
5. People of all religions, the non-religious, the areligious, *et al*., are welcome here. Please act in a welcoming manner.
6. Only write in English, please.

Thank you!

Join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/CFvHkBKB3v

data.description:
A guild dedicated to celebrating and remembering the way we were
   
This is about America.  But if you have a cool picture from another country I'll allow it.
   
**You will no longer be banned for posting pics involving POCs!**

Rules: 

1) Don't break Ruqqus TOS. If someone in the comment section offends you, block them. I'm not going to ban them. 
   
2) Posts should be related to the guild. 
   
3) Don't downvote! Downvoting is lame. If a post is off-topic, report it.

data.description:
*attributes of posts that are not cursed*
1 Any random gross/weird food.
2 A meme of any kind, especially:
 • Beans
 • Edgy humor.
 • T-Posing.
3 Clearly photoshopped images, especially faceswaps and deep fried images.
4 Any image where the focus is on/ divided by text. This includes:
 • Headlines/ Titles
 • Weird presentations
• Social Media Screenshot
 • Watermarks
5 Pop Culture. This includes:
 • All Video Games and Video Game Characters
 • Any illustration, or digital rendering, especially Minions, Shrek, and Spongebob.
 • Celebrities.
6 A random object(s) you found sitting next to you.
7 Any image where the focus of the entire image is mild body horror or a grievous injury, and nothing else. (Some exceptions apply)
8 Porn, or posts whose main focus is sexual
9 You or your friend doing random poses in the dark.
10 Statues/Weird 3D Art Pieces.
11 Furries/Weebs/Any other "weird" sect of the internet.
12 Halloween Costumes
13 Pets with Lens Flairs
14 Posts whose main focus is politics

This includes: • Headlines/ Titles • Weird presentations • Social Media Screenshot • Watermarks 5 Pop Culture. This includes: • All Video Games and Video Game Characters • Any illustration, or digital rendering, especially Minions, Shrek, and Spongebob. • Celebrities. 6 A random object(s) you found sitting next to you. 7 Any image where the focus of the entire image is mild body horror or a grievous injury, and nothing else. (Some exceptions apply) 8 Porn, or posts whose main focus is sexual 9 You or your friend doing random poses in the dark. 10 Statues/Weird 3D Art Pieces. 11 Furries/Weebs/Any other "weird" sect of the internet. 12 Halloween Costumes 13 Pets with Lens Flairs 14 Posts whose main focus is politics

data.description: Photos of beautiful landscapes. You must put the location in the title. If you don't know it, check your source or use tineye/google reverse image search. Only large and high res photos please. If you like this format, also check out: * +Architecture * +Infrastructure * +Interiors * +Artifacts * +Organisms * +Paintings * +Illustrations * +Humans * +Raining * +SpacePictures * +GamingPhotography * +AnimeArt Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
data.description_html:
Photos of beautiful landscapes. You must put the location in the title. If you don't know it, check your source or use tineye/google reverse image search. Only large and high res photos please.
